param.name: show
param.label: Show
param.description: Here you can decide, What you want to see in the module

param.name: display_style
param.label: Display Style
param.description: Here you can decide wether the manufacturers are shown

param.name: manufacturers_per_row
param.label: manufacturers per row
param.description: The Number of columns per row for the manufacturers snapshots.

param.name: headerText
param.label: Header Text
param.description: Add a Text before list of Manufacturers.

param.name: footerText
param.label: Footer Text
param.description: Add a Text after list of Manufacturers.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
